title: Number Has Decimal Digits
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of checking if a number has any decimal digits using JavaScript. We will learn how to use the modulo operator to check if a number is divisible by one and return the result. Through practical examples and exercises, we will gain a better understanding of how to implement this concept in our JavaScript programs.

meta.title: Exploring Decimal Digits in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to check if a number has decimal digits using the modulo operator in JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, decimal digits, javascript practice, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, javascript lab, javascript tutor, modulo operator

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
